description: A flaw in the offline synchronization logic could lead to silent data loss or corruption for users who modify data on multiple devices or while their connection is intermittent.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a comprehensive E2E test suite using Cypress to simulate various offline/online scenarios. Add UI notifications to inform the user when their local change was overwritten.
contingency_plan: Prioritize re-architecting the sync mechanism to use a more robust strategy like version vectors or a CRDT library.
monitoring_trigger: An increase in customer support tickets related to 'lost variables' or 'modes not saving'.

description: A sandbox escape vulnerability in the user-defined formula execution service (T044) could allow a malicious user to execute arbitrary code on the AWS Lambda environment.
mitigation_strategy: Conduct a rigorous security review of the Lambda implementation. Enforce a minimal-privilege IAM role with no network access. Keep `isolated-vm` library updated.
contingency_plan: Immediately disable the custom formula execution API endpoint. Rotate all application secrets.
monitoring_trigger: Unusual activity in CloudWatch logs for the execution Lambda.

description: The complexity of implementing the Offline Synchronization feature is significantly underestimated, leading to major project delays.
mitigation_strategy: Conduct a time-boxed technical spike to de-risk implementation and refine estimates. Prioritize a 'Minimum Viable Product' version (e.g., offline sync for history only).
contingency_plan: Engage stakeholders early to negotiate de-scoping less critical features from the v1.0 release.
monitoring_trigger: The technical spike for the feature exceeds its time box.
